body: Everyone spitting on the wife here and I agree but seriously, did you see how she was dressed for the massage, while jogging, with the gym teacher, and also her everyday dress with her boobs out and even the wedding dress lmao Anyone accepting that is asking to get cucked. I mean, everyone wants to fuck her, so it was bound to happen. Are there really guys who accept that irl? Bonus for the sister who go out dressed slutty after a fight with her « boyfriend » then gets thoroughly fucked by 2 tourists. Moral of the story: if your gf dresses like that and meet regularly with guys consider her a sexfriend, don’t go marry her unless you are into cuckolding lmao
wife deserves to die, the most horibble way.

This story has turn from typical meh fappable ntr -> taboo horny kinda hot -> full on boner killer depresso expresso -> furstuating trash that u want it to end already. This is why most of the time I tend to avoid long-ass ntr doujin with more plot driven storie as most of them are barely fappabble(the more grounded the story is and because of excessive scenes of pov from the character getting ntr'ed that you start to feel bad/angry for him/her aka major boner killer).
Yep, they are sister alright lol. Two different type of hoes but still hoes.

This is the definition of beating a dead horse, just end it already! it took 80 chapters just for the husband to start growing suspicious and I bet it's gonna take 80 more to end this. Author has been milking the same shit for so long that it became a chore to read and adding some useless flashbacks to prove that what she had with the masseur guy was the real deal and that mr husband was just a passing fling for her lol. This slut is guilty and hopeless and I hope she doesn't end up happily ever after what she did. I'm predicting she won't actually go through with the marriage bcs if she did then she really would be a shitty person even more than she already is. Husband dude is a coward with shitty judgement. All these characters are horrible but at least the art is good. Right now, I just want to see the husband's reaction once he finds out but it's taking foreverrrrrrrrrr but the way this is going it's probably gonna end in a happy end for everyone!

Read it till chapter 102 and even tho it's the same shit (she cheating and feeling "guilty") the history turn into something a little interesting, her husband couldn't hold it longer and starts to bang her and he then gets suspicious of his wife sensibility but still fuck her, so far that's all. The author seems like wants to drag this long adding the both of them fighting for her so from chapter 1 to chapter 102 this is shitty quality story but good art for fap which is why we are here, right? wouldn't bother buying this and wait for the free content tbh.
Wow I reached page 480
They fail at moving on each other.. seems like they will go back in their relationship while the husband just throw away by her, what poor him..

@verzhella Latest chapter is 90 released on 11th March 2021. This is completed at 4 volumes (? chapters). Official website is coolmic, but you'll have to make an account, turn on 18+ mode and buy the chapters for tickets. Each chapter about 7 tickets (~$0.63) there. They have Traditional Job of Washing Girl's Body and some other good ones too if you're willing to pay (Correct me if I'm wrong but I don't think these are scanlated. This is content locked behind paywall we're seeing for free, so don't complain).
